name: Age of Empires 3: The Asian Dynasties Save File
summary: Learn about .AGE3YSAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AGE3YSAV files are located in the \​My Documents\​My Games\​Age of Empires 3\​Savegame\​ directory.
The Age of Empires 3 game without expansion packs uses the .AGE3SAV extension for save files. The first expansion, Age of Empires 3: The WarChiefs, uses the .AGE3XSAV file extension.

description: Save file used by Age of Empires 3: The Asian Dynasties, a real-time strategy game expansion pack; stores game progress, such as constructed buildings, explored terrain, and generated units.
